description: Cloudle is a puzzle game that presents a daily challenge and draws inspiration from Wordle. In this version, players must reveal the five-day weather outlook for a particular city. With a different city featured each day from around the globe, there's always a new challenge to take on, even if the cities repeat themselves. What remains constant, however, is the ever-changing weather forecast.
name: cloudle
